sentences.sContent: May I have the use of your skiff?
sentences.sContent_eng: May I have the use of your skiff?
sentences.sCn: 我可以借用一下您的小艇吗？

sentences.sContent: All lights were out when he sailed into the little harbor and beached his skiff.
sentences.sContent_eng: All lights were out when he sailed into the little harbor and beached his skiff.
sentences.sCn: 当他划进小港，让小船冲上沙滩时，岸上的灯火都已灭了。

trans.tranOther: a small light boat for one person
